data.question: Which is NOT part of the Gestalt?
Does a file count as PNG when a client sends you a file in word format?
choices: Yes, as long as the image attached to the document is a PNG
It depends on the version of Microsoft Word

data.question: What is monochromatic color?
choices: Colors with different tints, shades, and tones
A color combination consisting of only white, gray, and black
Color combinations consisting of primary colors
data.answer: Colors with different tints, shades, and tones

data.question: Colors that are opposite each other on the color wheel are called?
What is Leading?
choices: Vertical distance between lines of writing

data.question: The following are tools that are included in the Transformation tools category, EXCEPT:
You can change the width and length of the artboard after you create it.
choices: Only when reducing the size of the artboard

data.question: Where can you find the Drop Shadow Effect?
Can you expand brush strokes?
What does PNG stand for?
Can you guys duplicate the layers to another Adobe Photoshop file?
choices: Only on files that have the same artboard size
data.answer: Only on files that have the same artboard size

data.question: What are Levels?
choices: To stack and merge images on top of each other
Adjustment for all color tones in the tonal range
Restore the previous version of the image
data.answer: To stack and merge images on top of each other

data.question: Can you edit thousands of images at once in Adobe Photoshop?
choices: Yes, with hard work and determination

data.question: If you want to change the font for an entire document, what can save you time?
choices: Copy and paste the frame type
Using the Eye Drop tool on the new frame type to another
data.answer: Copy and paste the frame type

data.question: Here are a few ways to add text to an Adobe Indesign document, EXCEPT:
choices: Paste file with text from Microsoft Word
data.answer: Paste file with text from Microsoft Word

data.question: Can you have more than ONE slide master?
What will you do on your first day at the office?
choices: Wait until you are given a job
data.answer: Wait until you are given a job

data.question: What is the most important thing you have to do to prepare for an interview?
choices: Remembering all the things that had to be said
Self-care to keep yourself calm and boost your confidence

data.question: How do you accept criticism from your co-workers?
choices: Learn from criticism and constructive input for your work
Try to keep your design when you are confident with it
Prove to them whether what they say can make your design better or not
data.answer: Learn from criticism and constructive input for your work

data.question: What is the first thing you should do when you start a meeting with a potential client?
choices: Shake their hands and introduce yourselves
data.answer: Shake their hands and introduce yourselves
